title: Present Continuous vs. Present Perfect Continuous

questions.question: The children …………………………….. in the garden.
questions.description: The present continuous is used to talk about ongoing situations when there is no reference to duration.

questions.question: She …………………………… at that computer for hours.
questions.description: The present perfect continuous is used to talk about an action or situation that started in the past and has continued up to the present. It is common with the time expressions since and for.
